Articles.Content:
A while back I started a KSP NASA series with Mission Control Extended, however after adding and removing several mods, the save became hopelessly corrupted. I was kind of okay with this, as the series wasn't going as I was wanting it to, and .24 was just around the corner. Now, a little older, and a lot wiser, the project begins anew, now helmed by someone who knows something about video editing and efficient science gathering.

Starts Monday, July 28.

(It's not going to be as dramatic as the trailer, probably. I just love that line from the beginning of The Right Stuff)
Too bad ill be away when the first ep comes out, oh well i'll watch it on Tuesday night.
